sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Card class="border energy-ratio">
    <template #title> Energy Ratio </template>
    <template #content>
          <!-- <Chart
            type="doughnut"
            :data="chartData"
            width="150"
            :options="lightOptions"
          /> -->
          <MyDonutChart></MyDonutChart>
    </template>
  </Card>
</template>

<script>
import MyDonutChart from "./MyDonutChart.vue";
export default {
    mounted() {
    },
    data() {
        return {
            chartData: {
                labels: ["Fats", "Carbs", "Protein"],
                datasets: [
                    {
                        data: [30, 400, 100],
                        backgroundColor: ["#50514F", "#23CE6B", "#A846A0"],
                    },
                ],
            },
            lightOptions: {
                plugins: {
                    legend: {
                        labels: {
                            color: "#50514F",
                        },
                    },
                },
            },
        };
    },
    components: { MyDonutChart }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.border {
  border-top: 8px solid var(--gray);
  height: 250px;
}

.energy-ratio {
  max-width: 300px;
}
</style>
